title: How to solve puzzles of reasoning fast and quickly and also setting arrangement - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are good at mathematics you will surely find reasoning very simple and easy. To solve puzzles of reasoning follow this steps Read the question carefully.Take your time. Don't rush.Keep a rough paper to draw the sequence.Give names to the given letters in the question and link them with your own members.Practice , practice and more practice.
